title: transfering to another server
body: riot can you please change the transfer to another server cost ip because i have friends in the EU west but i m in the EU nordic and ease and i realy want to play with them because every time we hang out they say wow dude lets play league lets later play league and i get so freaking anoyd that i cant play with them.       (sorry for my english)

replies.body: There's not a lot I can personally do about lowering any costs, but we do rarely open up free server transfers like the recent one going from EU to TR. Be sure to check out the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to make sure you don't miss it if we do another from EUNE -> EUW.
if that happens im going to be so thankful :D
